pages.text: Arra wa yoru to hiru o tsugitsugini kotai sa seru. Hontoni korera no nakaniha, mirume o motsu mono e no kyokun ga aru

Mata arra wa, aritoarayuru dobutsu o mizu kara tsukura reta. Sono aru mono wa, hara de hai, mata aru mono wa 2-pon ashi de aruki, aru mono wa 4tsu ashi de aruku. Arra wa o nozomi no mono o tsukura reru. Hontoni arra wa nanigoto ni tsuke zen'no de ara reru
Ware wa meiryona shirushi no kazukazu o kudashita. Arra wa okonomino-sha o tadashi michi ni michibika reru
Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa,`watashi-tachi wa arra to shito o shinji, fukuju suru.' To iu. Daga sonogo, kare-ra no ichibu wa somuki satta. Korera no mono wa (shin no) shinjade wanai
Kare-ra no ma wa sabaki no tame ni, arra to shito no mae ni yobidasa reru to, mi nasai. Ichibu no mono wa kaihi suru
Moshi, kare-ra ga tadashi nonara, sunao ni kare no moto ni yattekurudearou

Kare-ra no kokoro ni wa yamai ga yadotte iru no ka, soretomo utagai o daite iru no ka. Matawa arra to shito ga, kare-ra ni taishi fukoheina atsukai o suru to osoreru no ka. Iya, kare-ra koso fugimonodearu
Honto no shinja-tachi wa, sabaki no tame, arra to shito ni yobidasa reru to,`kashikomarimashita. Shitagaimasu.' To iu. Hontoni, sono yona hitobito koso sakaeru monodearu
Arra to shito ni fukuju shi, arra o osore, kare ni jibun no gimu o tsukusu mono, sono yona hitobito koso (saigo no mokuteki o) joju suru monodearu

Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa, moshi anata ga (shussei o) meijitanaraba, kanarazu dete iku koto o arra ni chikai kete genshuku ni chikau. Itte yaru ga i. `Chikawanakute mo yoi. Kyojun koso dori ni kanau. Hontoni arra wa anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
